title: Meditation: Embracing Life with an Open Heart (2020-03-25)
itunes:title: Meditation: Embracing Life with an Open Heart
description: Meditation: Embracing Life with an Open Heart (2020-03-25) - In this short practice we connect with our aspiration to live from love, and then bring a caring presence to our own vulnerability, to a dear one, and to all beings everywhere.
content:encoded: Meditation: Embracing Life with an Open Heart (2020-03-25) - In this short practice we connect with our aspiration to live from love, and then bring a caring presence to our own vulnerability, to a dear one, and to all beings everywhere.

itunes:author: Tara Brach
